Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: Intimate ICO Launches Sex Industry Token
Body: Pioneers in Adult Industry use blockchain technology to provide financial services that other sectors take for granted.  Currently, there is a trade-off between people’s desire to keep their personal data anonymous while also wanting the trust and safety that comes with data disclosure and transparency. intimate.io solves this problem with:  •       A Payments Solution to address industry-wide difficulties with accessing basic banking products and merchant services due to moral bias;  •       A Pseudonymous Reputation System which affords users the right to transact - both online and in the physical world - with privacy and trust;  •       Partnerships With Industry to develop a clear framework which differentiates between ‘good’ and ‘bad’ actors on the network, to protect human rights, define industry best practice and support ethical conduct;  •       Partnering With Oracles for scalable off-chain verification of information such as personal ID and Sexually Transmitted Infection health checks. Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/intimate-token-pre-sale-ends/

Author: EthRoy
Title: Intimate ICO Launches Sex Industry Token
Body: Well, though firstly it seems a little finny but actually it can be of great demand. Why is your roadmap so long? It can discourage many potential investors.
